collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (19 total Queries, 18 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT e.remarks,e.expense_id,e.date,e.name,SUM(i.amount) AS total,e.status,u.added_by,e.added_on,u.name AS nameuser FROM tbl_expense e LEFT JOIN tbl_expense_item i ON e.expense_id = i.expense_id INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON e.added_by = u.user_id GROUP BY e.expense_id ORDER BY e.added_on DESC

select tacl.user_group_id as ugi, tacl.module_id as mi, name
        from tbl_module as tm, tbl_access_control_list as tacl
        where tm.module_id = tacl.module_id
        and tacl.user_group_id = 12

select ifnull ((select count(customer_id)
            from tbl_reservation as tblr
            where tblr.status = 'open'), 0) as open,

            ifnull ((select count(customer_id)
            from tbl_reservation as tblr
            where tblr.status = 'ready'), 0) as ready,

            ifnull ((select count(customer_id)
            from tbl_reservation as tblr
            where tblr.status = 'completed'), 0) as completed,

            ifnull ((select count(customer_id)
            from tbl_reservation as tblr
            where tblr.status = 'cancelled'), 0) as cancelled,

            ifnull ((select count(customer_id)
            from tbl_reservation as tblr), 0) as reserv

select 
    
            ifnull ((select count(supplier_id)
            from tbl_purchase as tblp
            where tblp.status = 'pending'), 0) as pending,

            ifnull ((select count(supplier_id)
            from tbl_purchase as tblp
            where tblp.status = 'delivered'), 0) as delivered,

            ifnull ((select count(supplier_id)
            from tbl_purchase as tblp
            where tblp.status = 'cancelled'), 0) as cancelled,

            ifnull ((select count(supplier_id)
            from tbl_purchase as tblp), 0) as purch

select 
        
            ifnull ((select count(sales_id)
            from tbl_sales as tbls
            where tbls.status = 'delivered'), 0) as delivered,

            ifnull ((select count(sales_id)
            from tbl_sales as tbls
            where tbls.status = 'cancelled'), 0) as cancelled,

            ifnull ((select count(sales_id)
            from tbl_sales as tbls
            where tbls.status = 'missing'), 0) as missing,

            ifnull ((select count(sales_id)
            from tbl_sales as tbls), 0) as sales

select 
    
            ifnull ((select count(stock_transfer_id)
            from tbl_stock_transfer as tblst
            where tblst.status = 'pending'), 0) as pending,

            ifnull ((select count(stock_transfer_id)
            from tbl_stock_transfer as tblst
            where tblst.status = 'completed'), 0) as completed,

            ifnull ((select count(stock_transfer_id)
            from tbl_stock_transfer as tblst
            where tblst.status = 'cancelled'), 0) as cancelled,

            ifnull ((select count(stock_transfer_id)
            from tbl_stock_transfer as tblst), 0) as stck

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.
queries.sql:
select tacl.user_group_id as ugi, tacl.module_id as mi, name
        from tbl_module as tm, tbl_access_control_list as tacl
        where tm.module_id = tacl.module_id
        and tacl.user_group_id = 12

SELECT ei.expense_item_id,ec.name AS category,ei.description,ei.amount,ei.expense_category_id FROM tbl_expense_item ei INNER JOIN tbl_expense_category ec ON ei.expense_category_id = ec.expense_category_id WHERE ei.expense_id = '2'

SELECT pd.payment_id,pd.payment_detail_id,pd.bank_account_id,pd.date,pd.method,CONCAT(ba.name, ' (', ba.account_number, ')') AS bank_account,pd.check_payee,pd.check_number,pd.amount,pd.status FROM tbl_payment_detail pd INNER JOIN (SELECT p.payment_id FROM tbl_payment p INNER JOIN tbl_payment_item pi ON p.payment_id = pi.payment_id WHERE pi.id = '2' AND p.type = 'expense' ) payment ON pd.payment_id = payment.payment_id LEFT JOIN tbl_bank_account ba ON pd.bank_account_id = ba.bank_account_id

SELECT ei.expense_item_id,ec.name AS category,ei.description,ei.amount,ei.expense_category_id FROM tbl_expense_item ei INNER JOIN tbl_expense_category ec ON ei.expense_category_id = ec.expense_category_id WHERE ei.expense_id = '22'

SELECT pd.payment_id,pd.payment_detail_id,pd.bank_account_id,pd.date,pd.method,CONCAT(ba.name, ' (', ba.account_number, ')') AS bank_account,pd.check_payee,pd.check_number,pd.amount,pd.status FROM tbl_payment_detail pd INNER JOIN (SELECT p.payment_id FROM tbl_payment p INNER JOIN tbl_payment_item pi ON p.payment_id = pi.payment_id WHERE pi.id = '22' AND p.type = 'expense' ) payment ON pd.payment_id = payment.payment_id LEFT JOIN tbl_bank_account ba ON pd.bank_account_id = ba.bank_account_id

SELECT ei.expense_item_id,ec.name AS category,ei.description,ei.amount,ei.expense_category_id FROM tbl_expense_item ei INNER JOIN tbl_expense_category ec ON ei.expense_category_id = ec.expense_category_id WHERE ei.expense_id = '1'

SELECT pd.payment_id,pd.payment_detail_id,pd.bank_account_id,pd.date,pd.method,CONCAT(ba.name, ' (', ba.account_number, ')') AS bank_account,pd.check_payee,pd.check_number,pd.amount,pd.status FROM tbl_payment_detail pd INNER JOIN (SELECT p.payment_id FROM tbl_payment p INNER JOIN tbl_payment_item pi ON p.payment_id = pi.payment_id WHERE pi.id = '1' AND p.type = 'expense' ) payment ON pd.payment_id = payment.payment_id LEFT JOIN tbl_bank_account ba ON pd.bank_account_id = ba.bank_account_id
